data.name: FameGoal
data.challenge: Learn how to work in a group and make money with a website(IN PROGRESS).
data.solution: Create a website that's sell and buy followers and likes automatically for all the famous platform with an excellent UX/UI(Instagram, Facebook, TikTok)

data.name: ShoppyScrapper
data.challenge: Create a Search Engine That can find all the sellers of a product on Shoppy.
data.solution: I decided to make a web scraper that, with advanced google research, will find all the sellers. To do that, I used Puppeteer in the backend.

data.name: Coca-Cola
data.challenge: Create a Website from a given template made by a designer
data.solution: I decided to use SCSS for the styling and utilized a basic CSS keyframe to animate it.

data.name: Nadlan
data.challenge: Create a Website for a real estate agency. They need it Responsive; the primary colour is orange; A form needs to be in the centre and send it directly to a mail.
data.solution: For the responsive part, I used commons breakpoints with CSS, and for the form part, I used EmailJs.

data.name: Answers.com Scrapper
data.challenge: Create a Scrapper for the website https://www.answers.com/ getting all the categories, questions, and data on the questions.
data.solution: I decided to use a library called Cheerio to get the data and get the help of Regex to filter only relevant information.
